description: Commands to manage a VM Group workload network.

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group create
commands.summary: Create a vm group by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network vm-group create --name
                                           --private-cloud
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--display-name]
                                           [--members]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--revision]
examples: az vmware workload-network vm-group create --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --vm-group vmGroup1 --display-name vmGroup1 --members 564d43da-fefc-2a3b-1d92-42855622fa50 --revision 1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group delete
commands.summary: Delete a vm group by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network vm-group delete [--ids]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--private-cloud]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]
examples: az vmware workload-network vm-group delete --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --vm-group vmGroup1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group list
commands.summary: List of vm groups in a private cloud workload network.
examples: az vmware workload-network vm-group list --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group show
commands.summary: Get a vm group by id in a private cloud workload network.
examples: az vmware workload-network vm-group show --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --vm-group vmGroup1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group update
commands.summary: Update a vm group by id in a private cloud workload network.
commands.syntax:
az vmware workload-network vm-group update [--add]
                                           [--display-name]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--members]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--private-cloud]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--revision]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
examples: az vmware workload-network vm-group update --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --vm-group vmGroup1 --display-name vmGroup1 --members 564d43da-fefc-2a3b-1d92-42855622fa50 --revision 1

commands.name: az vmware workload-network vm-group wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
